channel.title: Downloading pictures to your cell phone
channel.description:
My friend wants to send me a picture with his cell and i cant download pics dose anyone know how i could get these pics maybe there's a number he could send it too and i could retrieve it online or something?? i know you can send text messages on Cincinnati bells web site so maybe you could get pics somehow If anyone has any ideas please reply!!! Maybe some one could help me summarize what i am looking for so i can google it or something
From what i understand there is a way to view picture messages online?? anyone know?
I think i wana receive MMS free online...

item.title: Downloading pictures to your cell phone
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

Razors take sim cards and i figured everything out my friend has verizon and i got a email with the pic so thanks for all the help!!!

Read full topic

Razors dont take memory cards (too thin )

The original Doesn’t, but the media Razor does.

item.title: Downloading pictures to your cell phone
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Tico135:

Now save the picture to your SIM card

You cant save pictures to SIM Cards? MMS is downloaded to the phone using a wap connection Correct me if im and wrong and explain how.

Read full topic
item.source: Downloading pictures to your cell phone

item.title: Downloading pictures to your cell phone
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“Jeremy368, post:10, topic:258638”]Hell i will try it…

5 seconds later…

Nope dosent work i can only enter numbers in[/quote]

Then his phone is shit.

The only other alternative is only available if you guys use SIM cards. If so, save the picture to his phone, not SIM card, take his SIM card out and yours in. Now save the picture to your SIM card, take it out, and put his back in. Now put your SIM card back into your phone and you now have the picture.

Read full topic
item.source: Downloading pictures to your cell phone

item.title: Downloading pictures to your cell phone
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

ok i have a razor v3 (shitty phone breaks way too easy) how do i go about sending a picture to a email?? I really dont care if it ends up on my phone i just wana see the picture

Read full topic
item.source: Downloading pictures to your cell phone

item.title: Downloading pictures to your cell phone
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Tico135:

Your friend can send it to an email address, and you can retrieve it on your computer. Gathering that your phone isn’t shit, plug your phone into your computer and move the picture over.

I do this pretty much, just with my phone’s memory card + it’s adaptor.

Read full topic

item.title: Downloading pictures to your cell phone
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

If you want upload it to the internet, use: http://www.imserba.com/wapupload/

An MMS message can be sent to an E-mail address. Use that if you want to “MMS free Online”

Read full topic
item.source: Downloading pictures to your cell phone

item.title: Downloading pictures to your cell phone
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I am a little confused. If you mean send it from his phone to yours, use Bluetooth if you have it. Otherwise, if you want to get it on your phone a different way or on the computer, he can send it in an e-mail.

Read full topic
